types:type.name: jsonObjRequ
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonObjRequ = {| FirstName: String, MiddleName: String, LastName: String, BirthDate: String, Height: String, Weight: String, BillingStreet: String, BillingCity: String, BillingState: String, BillingPostalCode: String, BillingCountry: String, CreatedDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"Kidane\\\",\\\"MiddleName\\\":\\\"Samuel\\\",\\\"LastName\\\":\\\"Tesfa\\\",\\\"BirthDate\\\":\\\"1985-10-11\\\",\\\"Height\\\":\\\"5.7\\\",\\\"Weight\\\":\\\"60\\\",\\\"BillingStreet\\\":\\\"5415 W Harmon Avenue\\\",\\\"BillingCity\\\":\\\"Las Vegas\\\",\\\"BillingState\\\":\\\"NV\\\",\\\"BillingPostalCode\\\":\\\"89103\\\",\\\"BillingCountry\\\":\\\"US\\\",\\\"CreatedDate\\\":\\\"2020-10-12\\\"}"}

types:type.name: jsonArrayRes
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonArrayRes = Array<{| FirstName: String, MiddleName: String, LastName: String, BirthDate: String, Height: String, Weight: String, BillingStreet: String, BillingCity: String, BillingState: String, BillingPostalCode: String, BillingCountry: String, CreatedDate: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"Kidane\\\",\\\"MiddleName\\\":\\\"Samuel\\\",\\\"LastName\\\":\\\"Tesfa\\\",\\\"BirthDate\\\":\\\"1985-10-11\\\",\\\"Height\\\":\\\"5.7\\\",\\\"Weight\\\":\\\"60\\\",\\\"BillingStreet\\\":\\\"5415 W Harmon Avenue\\\",\\\"BillingCity\\\":\\\"Las Vegas\\\",\\\"BillingState\\\":\\\"NV\\\",\\\"BillingPostalCode\\\":\\\"89103\\\",\\\"BillingCountry\\\":\\\"US\\\",\\\"CreatedDate\\\":\\\"2020-10-12\\\"},{\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"Selam\\\",\\\"MiddleName\\\":\\\"Beyene\\\",\\\"LastName\\\":\\\"Tesfa\\\",\\\"BirthDate\\\":\\\"1980-10-11\\\",\\\"Height\\\":\\\"5.9\\\",\\\"Weight\\\":\\\"90\\\",\\\"BillingStreet\\\":\\\"2057 west shwgo\\\",\\\"BillingCity\\\":\\\"Baltimor\\\",\\\"BillingState\\\":\\\"MD\\\",\\\"BillingPostalCode\\\":\\\"20556\\\",\\\"BillingCountry\\\":\\\"US\\\",\\\"CreatedDate\\\":\\\"2020-10-12\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: arraycsvres
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type arraycsvres = Array<{| FirstName: String, MiddleName: String, LastName: String, BirthDate: String, Height: String, Weight: String, BillingStreet: String, BillingCity: String, BillingState: String, BillingPostalCode: String, BillingCountry: String, CreatedDate: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: getcsv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type getcsv = Array<{| ClientKey: String, FirstName: String, MiddleName: String, LastName: String, BirthDate: String, Height: String, Weight: String, BillingStreet: String, BillingCity: String, BillingState: String, BillingPostalCode: String, BillingCountry: String, CreatedDate: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}
